## RumInitConfiguration.excludedActivityUrls property

A list of request origins ignored when computing the page activity. See <a href="https://docs.datadoghq.com/real_user_monitoring/browser/monitoring_page_performance/#how-page-activity-is-calculated">How page activity is calculated</a> for further information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
excludedActivityUrls?: MatchOption[] | undefined;
```
